website_summaries.verdict: Easy-to-use restoration kit that removes scratches and cloudiness in the headlights.
pros: Only takes about an hour to restore a pair of headlights
Includes all of the items you need to restore a pair of headlights fully
Doesn't require any extra tools to complete the process, and you won't damage the surface of the headlight lens
cons: Price is little high, considering it's only designed for 2 headlights

customer_reviews.title: Happy with results - confirming with pictures
customer_reviews.text: Headlights on rx350 dimmed significantly after almost 10 years and we were thinking about replacing headlights. Checked the price and it end up $145 each + plus installation. I did some research and found out about a few types of restoration toolkits. Looking into reviews and ratings, decided to give this one a chance. Was a little bit sceptical but went ahead and ordered. Followed instructions precisely (I find it a little bit too detailed and confusing to a degree) but results were surprisingly good. Well, better to see it once (Pictures attached) If I would do thing again, I would not hesitate to use 3M product; highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent results.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried the non-drill lens restoration systems, and they either just don't work or require upper body endurance training to work...and even then not very well. This is more expensive than most but VERY effective at restoring the lens to excellent clarity. It also saves your arms from aching for the next 2 days. Good instructions and excellent results. Once you get the technique down, the process goes pretty smoothly. Seems to be needed about every 1.5-2 years on our cars here in Colorado. I no longer waste time, money, or arm torture on the other systems.
customer_reviews.author: W. Gipson

customer_reviews.title: Who turned out the lights?
customer_reviews.text: My headlights were so bad that unless there weren't any street lights and it was pitch black I couldn't even tell that my lights were on and even then only barely, so bad that when traveling through the woods in pitch blackness I had to follow the car ahead of me and trust that they were following in the lines of the road because I couldn't tell that mine were on at all, especially when a car came and completely drowned everything out. Terrifying. Now though, not only have I used this restoration kit but I also bought the ultra bright lights so that I can see EVERYTHING. Even how my headlight line is completely uneven *sobs*
customer_reviews.author: Sai

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit...would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Did the job on my sons 2005 Ford F-150. Lights were in terrible shape, I mean extra special bad shape. This kit did the trick, they look great now. I did buy one kit for each headlight as another reviewer suggested. If I had not done that I would not have had enough material to do the job. Had never attempted polishing the headlights before but kit was easy to use, good instructions, and it worked. I would also suggest an electric drill NOT a battery drill, the battery drill will not be able to keep up with the demand. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: DKE

customer_reviews.title: Best restoration kit! Buy Headlight Sealer Too!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this in the past and I absolutely love it! It works! Save yourself from the hundreds wasted on new headlights. The only issue is that your headlights will slowly go back to being the way they were if you don't "seal" them. Some companies make headlight sealer so be sure to get that too! For restoration though this is hands down the best kit.
customer_reviews.author: Bino

customer_reviews.title: Amazed!
customer_reviews.text: It definitely takes some patience but I cannot believe how good the headlights came out. I originally had to always use the high beams to see at night because the regular lights were no longer bright enough, now its like they're brand new headlights! As some reviews stated, definitely use painters tape or automotive tape around the headlight to prevent damage to the surrounding paint/clear coat. Take your time and don't rush it, took me about 45mins each headlight from start to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Dude495

customer_reviews.title: My lenses look new, now. Take your time ...
customer_reviews.text: My lenses look new, now. Take your time. Follow the directions, especially about the extra effort on the sanding stages it pays off in the finished quality. I wiped the sanding residue off the lenses frequently. This lets you check the level of scratches. I also cleaned the pads frequently (wiping with a micro fiber towel). I only used two of the gold (500 grit) pads and they are still usable. When using the gray (3000 grit) refining pad, make sure you mist with water frequently. I used a wet cotton towel to wipe the lenses frequently, so I could see the progress. Do not forget to put some lens sealer on, to preserve all that work.
customer_reviews.author: Movie watcher

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: These reinvigorated my car! They made my headlines shinier than I had ever saw them! I have a 14 year old car and these made those lights look brand new. And it made my car look YEARS! Newer! Would def recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Newton

customer_reviews.title: Works alright. Depends on your determination!
customer_reviews.text: If you are willing to be aggressive. These work pretty well. However they can be painful if you have a large light housing like my girlfriend. However Tacoma's headlights are perfect for this since they are squared off. I've reused the same pads quite a few times. I just occasionally spin them agsisnt a paper cowl as I'm using them. It takes the plastic out of the sandpaper so you don't have replace them so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product....good as new....cheaper at auto store down the street.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! I've tried others and have had less than stellar results. But this did exactly what it said it would and I couldn't be more thrilled. Read the instructions....and follow along carefully. Do as they say, take your time and care with each step...and you will have "like new" results. Word of caution....do not press hard while sanding....slow, even, and steady is the way to go. The process took me roughly 45 min - 1 hour to complete on my Saturn Aura sedan. One package was enough. My only regret was that i noticed the auto store down the street carried the exact same product for roughly $5 less than what I paid here on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Clear up my 15yr old headlights
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well on my old headlights on both mine and my wifes car, I do it once a year, people are baffled how oir old cars lights look so new 👍
customer_reviews.author: TTGadgetGuy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$!
customer_reviews.text: A very easy process and only needed one kit for both front headlights of a 2001 Tacoma. The before and after is outstanding, a good drill motor & the rubbing compound are really what is key here. I’d recommend this to anybody who has issues with cloudiness!
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: no other kit compares, this was awesome results.
customer_reviews.text: OMG ! this kit, AWESOME, THIS Headlight Lens Restoration System 2-pack BROUGHT my head lamps back to 99.95% brand new saved me $ 300+ dollars on having to replace them. The seller actually under promised and over delivered. This kit is awesome !
customer_reviews.author: butch2006

customer_reviews.title: no hook and loop
customer_reviews.text: the part of the drill that holds the pads on does not stick. i called 3M and they said it was defective and that i should order a replacement. won't do it
customer_reviews.author: mark creaven

customer_reviews.title: There is a reason the car wash says "We can restore your headlights" They use the 3M products.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Follow the directions and your old headlights will turn out like new. Be patient and work slowly. If you get in a hurry it wont look good. The 1st sanding step is the most critical, and use a plug in drill, battery drills wont last long enough. Also, if you have an SUV or pickup with large headlights get 2 kits per headlight. Took me about 30 minutes per light and I did my fog lights too. I have a 2004 Ford Expedition.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Rundquist

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a smart purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! I can’t believe for this price how great this product is! My headlights were so bad I had to use my brights. They had so much build up. Very impressed! Pics included, was getting dark but still can see the difference. Left one has not been done compared to the right one that’s been done. 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Cher Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing difference this made
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!! What an amazing difference this made! I have tried so many different lens cleaners and figured I was going to have to go ahead and break down and buy new headlights for my vehicles, I have made the lenses on 4 vehicles look brand new with just 1 kit! We did a 93 ford F-250, 98 dodge ram 2500, 07 dodge caravan and a 08 Nitro and all lights look brand new except 1 on the 93 ford but that is because the inside of the lens is bad and filled with condensation.
customer_reviews.author: Hubby2311

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT !!!
customer_reviews.text: This product won't disappoint. Worked just as I was hoping for. After one of my headlight lenses needed to be replaced on my 2010 Toyota Corolla, I had 1 perfect lens and the other, a scratched/cloudy mess! I used a DeWalt (DCD771) 20V cordless drill with the 3M equipment provided, and got the results I hoped in about 60-90 minutes (took a few breaks).
customer_reviews.author: Mouse

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: This kit works magic. The lenses on my head lights where so clouded they couldn't pass inspection. After using this kit they now look brand new. Even a year later they still look great. Next time they start to look cloudy (and I'm sure they will), I won't wait so long to fix them. Great product! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Better results than I hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: I thought my headlights might be beyond saving. Nope, the 3M kit saved them. I had sanded them by hand twice before and used a wipe new kit last time. This was the first time I used a power drill kit. I got a 2pk and needed both to get the results shown (one per side). I then sealed them with a uv protector spray from Meguires. You'll definitely want a corded drill if yours are as bad as mine were. No battery would have got this done. I used a right angle drill and it was pretty easy to control.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen A. Nynas

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: One of the best kits out there. Needs to include masking tape.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Wade

customer_reviews.title: THIS is the kit to get!
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked great!! Just make sure you have a drill that goes fast enough. Take your time and keep the surface clean as you work. Made the truck look like new.
customer_reviews.author: LoganExplosion

customer_reviews.title: Shine 'em up real nice
customer_reviews.text: Great product for restoring headlights. Very easy to follow instructions, and after about 30 minutes I had crystal clear headlights again! So worth the price. Note- you do need to supply your own drill and automotive painters tape, but it's minimal effort for a great result. Just grab a couple of cold beers, crank up the Seger, and clean up those lights!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Dirt

customer_reviews.title: Works good and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Works just as it should. After polishing the plastic I clean it with simple green, rinse and dry it and apply nano coating for plastic to keep the plastic clear.
customer_reviews.author: needforspeed

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works well
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have ever tried to restore headlights so I really didn't know what I was getting. I just happen to pick this one. I am so glad I did. It is real simple to do. They give you way more then enough product to use in the package. A little time consuming but real easy. And this stuff works like a charm. Lights look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: My opinions only

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2, 1 for each headlight on my 06 saturn vue, they worked great, although the instructions are wrong about drill speed. Slow speed doesn't work you need to use high speed for clarity.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Just follow the instructions and a You tube video and it worked as suspected! Almost like new! I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Winkie

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice kit with clear instructions and ample sanding discs and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice kit with clear instructions and ample sanding discs and compound. I used these kits on two older BMWs but didn't get the results I was hoping for. The headlight surfaces are now very smooth, but the lenses are still cloudy. I think it's mainly due to the age of the plastic lenses but may have to try a second treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! Incredibly simple process!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely blown away by how well this product worked. For the price and results, I am shocked. Only took maybe 15 minutes per headlight. I truly believe this saved me from spending $400-$500 on a new set of headlight lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Not a 2 pack
customer_reviews.text: This is not a 2-pack. It's a kit for one car with two headlights. Quality kit, but not a two pack. Also, I'd like to have at least 2 sheets of a more coarse sandpaper for highly yellowed lenses. The 500 grit takes longer. Overall 2 starts because the headline is deceptive.
customer_reviews.author: ryan greer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and arrived on time. Used this before and very happy with the results. This will take any headlight, tail light, or marker light, and make it look showroom new. Easy to use. Follow the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak enough to this product. Simple to put on. Follow the instructions and clean up. Enjoy your new looking headlights!
customer_reviews.author: pickpocket094

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Does exactly what it's advertised to do.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. Brought the 20 year old headlight lenses on my 1997 F250 back to near new condition. I followed the directions exactly and could not be happier with the results. I was very methodical and probably spent about 20 minutes total per headlight.
customer_reviews.author: SCRWB

customer_reviews.title: Results!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it claims. I'm very happy with the results!
customer_reviews.author: Dina M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Just take your time through each step
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Just take your time through each step. Made a huge improvement on my smog/hard water stained lights. Make sure you mask off the lights as you will destroy paint or rubber seals as you grind away the scum.
customer_reviews.author: Maz

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on Mercedes E350
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on Mercedes E350. Lenses were pretty bad yet turned out really clear. Read thru some reviews and followed the advice of other users. Don't let the sanding discs get clogged. Stop and wipe the dust off headlight lenses frequently and knock any excess buildup off the sanding discs. I can get 1 or 2 more cars done with just this one package. Followed up with a coating of automotive Turtle Wax. Whole job took about an hour for the two headlights and two parking lights. Would definitely recommend if you have the time. Kind of a dirty job, but worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Get one for each headlight!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was going to have to buy new headlights . For so long I drove with my headlights in such poor condition that turning on my Briggs actually made visibility WORSE! I finally bought this kit for one headlight and I am so thrilled. Super easy to use and very efficient. NOTE: you need two kits to do your headlights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned up my 15 year old lenses pretty nice, not new, but close enough!
customer_reviews.author: John W. Russo

customer_reviews.title: For the money and time involved, I was very ...
customer_reviews.text: For the money and time involved, I was very impressed with this kit. Bought 2 kits and restored the lenses on my wifes CRV and my Tacoma. No complaints, just follow the steps and take your time.
customer_reviews.author: Crock

customer_reviews.title: Maybe your results will be better than mine.
customer_reviews.text: May or may not work depending on the amount of lens oxidation. Be sure to watch the YouTube instructional video, although it seems that their results were much better than mine. I bought this kit because the oxidation and UV fading cause some opacity of my headlamp lenses. But although my headlamps didn't seem too bad, I did not get the good results that 3M advertises. Yes, I did follow the instructions to the letter and yes, I have years of professional automotive experience. I ended up eventually just replacing the headlamp assemblies themselves. This kit was somewhat of a waste of time and money.. Your results may differ, however.
customer_reviews.author: Dan K.

customer_reviews.title: Worked really great! Improved my lights soo much that I can ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked really great! Improved my lights soo much that I can drive at night now.
customer_reviews.author: christina kapteyn

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: after some time and work did what it said it would
customer_reviews.author: skhagen

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Kit
customer_reviews.text: Great kit to restore those old headlights. Takes about 30-45 mins to complete including set up time. Worth the time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Alec

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with a drill
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with a drill. Took about 30 minutes. Worked as advertised in all respects. I used one pack on our 13 year old Scion Xa. Lenses like new after the process. Then I used a second pack on our 12 year old VW Jetta. Same excellent result.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M. Krieger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Within 1 hour both headlight lens looked like new. Was not hard to do, good price.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stiff works. should add more compound or whatever its called.
customer_reviews.author: jahseriah

customer_reviews.title: There is a hug difference and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: This definitely works! There is a hug difference and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Lawsro

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating Product
customer_reviews.text: Too much work and not enough pads. I ended up buying and cutting sheets of sand paper and double sided tape to be able to finish the job. Results may vary.
customer_reviews.author: PJordan

customer_reviews.title: You will need a drill car soap and a microfiber cloth
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to use and how fast you see the results of the process as you are doing the headlights or brakelights.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I have always been skeptical of these "as seen on tv" kind of products but I followed the directions exactly and it made my headlights look crystal clear and brand new. Dealer wanted thousands to replace them, I did it for like $20! A great product!!! Highly recommend! Pictures are before and after.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Looks even better in real life
customer_reviews.text: Must say I was surprised it worked so well. Picture 1 original unit Picture 2 after the wet sanding Picture 3 finishes product. Looks even better in real life. Other lens was worse came out better, take your time! I bought two kits so I will do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We've bought this twice, it is really great and car enthusiasts will love it
customer_reviews.author: MLawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best headlight restoration kit I've ever seen... used it multiple times on multiple cars, makes the lights look almost new.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: 3M always makes winner products and this is no exception!
customer_reviews.text: Best one out there!!! Make sure to get supplemental lens coatings to keep terrific results!
customer_reviews.author: charliecharlie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Did an outstanding job, looks like new, just follow directions
customer_reviews.author: DaShu

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the buck. Super easy to use if you have any sense at all. Shopped this product for up to $60, not necessary, this kit does the job wonderfully. Thanks 3M
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic product. I should have done this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value! Product does what it says. If you own a drill, this will save you money! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stratofier

customer_reviews.title: New in package good product I have used before I recommend this product ...
customer_reviews.text: New in package good product I have used before I recommend this product to anyone who would like to refinish their headlights take the time to do it right they come out brand newm
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, use headlight lens sealer!!
customer_reviews.text: Great headlight lens kit, just make sure you use a lens sealer afterwards or else the headlights will oxidize again a month later. They mention that in the guide!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... tried a few headlight restorers and this is the best
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few headlight restorers and this is the best yet
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL J MURPHY

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Product good, but head light lens did not end up as clear as I would have liked. Used on two headlights. Was greatly improved, but still a little cloudy...
customer_reviews.author: Ed C.

customer_reviews.title: Was quite amazed at what this did for our headlights
customer_reviews.text: Was quite amazed at what this did for our headlights ... went from looking sugarcoated to near crystal clear. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Casscles

customer_reviews.title: My wife was so happy she could see better at night
customer_reviews.text: Follow the instructions. Medium speed on an electric drill. Don't freak out because it gets all smokey looking. It really works. My wife was so happy she could see better at night.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Take your time and grind a good layer. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Losmen

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm I highly recommend this product to anyone with yellow hazy headlights you will be amazed of how good it works.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Huerta

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Worked nice. I was able to remove my headlights and that made it easier. Wish the 1st sanding step was a bit faster though.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, take you time as the instuctions note and it will turn out great. Looked like new when done
customer_reviews.author: ChipPA

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!!!! Exceeded me expectations. Just ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding!!!! Exceeded me expectations. Just keep in mind you do grind down the actual lens. So buy a recoat for it. Or else you'll keep grinding it down. Overall it's dead on.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: does not work at all
customer_reviews.text: pure junk do not get this, made the lens 10x worse thanks for the rip off
customer_reviews.author: Jason

product_meta.title: 3M 39008 Headlight Lens Restoration System 2-Pack
feature_bullets: 3 step process requires as little as an hour to get rid of scratches and restore dull and cloudy lenses
Polishing compound to restore hazy and dull headlights
